name: Sudoku Solver (itch) (stati30241)
description:
Instructions:

  • Click on a tile to enter a number on it.
  • Move around using the mouse or using the arrow keys.
  • To clear a tile, press backspace.
  • Press enter to let the program solve the puzzle.

More information about the algorithm: wikipedia

Source code: https://github.com/stati30241/Sudoku-Solver
